AllenAppAdvantageData.discription: Boost your score with practice! Pick topics & difficulty level, and let AI target your weak areas

AllenAppAdvantageData.title: 10 Lakh+ Doubts Solved

TestimonialsData.studentDescription: I chose ALLEN Online Courses because I wanted to balance my NEET prep with my school schedule. The course structure, from daily homework to post-class handouts, was well-organized.

I took NEET in 2023 but didn’t achieve my desired score, so I reattempted in 2024 with ALLEN Online Courses. The top-quality faculty, study material, & personalised experience on the ALLEN app helped me improve my score.
I wanted to stay with my family while preparing for JEE, so I chose ALLEN Online Courses. The faculty was great & the live classes, daily homework & test series helped me secure a great score & rank!

I came to know about ALLEN’s Online Test Series from my senior in school. The tests are really awesome as these are based mainly on NCERT and cover almost all types of NEET questions. They gave me the real feel of the competition.

allYouneettoKnow.title: Who can take this exam?
allYouneettoKnow.discription: The online mode of TALLENTEX is for students interested in enrolling in ALLEN's Online Courses, currently in classes 5-10.

allYouneettoKnow.title: How to register?
allYouneettoKnow.discription: Fill out the form above. You’ll get a confirmation on your registered mobile number. Log in using your number and OTP

allYouneettoKnow.title: How do I take the exam?
allYouneettoKnow.discription: The test will be monitored online at www.allen.in. Log in on your chosen date and time slot using your registered mobile number. Keep your camera on and ensure a stable internet connection.

allYouneettoKnow.title: Where do I check the scholarship details?
allYouneettoKnow.discription: Scholarships will be announced on www.allen.in in November 2025. You’ll also receive the details via SMS and inside your account. These can be used at the time of enrolment.

talentexfaqs.title: What is the syllabus, marking scheme & overall exam pattern for the TALLENTEX exam?
talentexfaqs.discription: The exam is based on the NCERT syllabus of both the previous and current class. You can also find the exam pattern under the 'Syllabus & exam pattern' section.

talentexfaqs.title: What is the duration and medium of the exam?
talentexfaqs.discription: The exam will be 2 hours long and conducted in English.

talentexfaqs.title: Do I need to create a new account for TALLENTEX 2025 if I registered for TALLENTEX 2024?
talentexfaqs.discription: Yes, you must create a new account using your mobile number as the login credential.

talentexfaqs.title: Can I reschedule the exam if I miss it?
talentexfaqs.discription: No, rescheduling is not allowed. Kindly ensure that you attend the test at your chosen date and time.

talentexfaqs.title: Who can I contact for support or queries?
talentexfaqs.discription: For any assistance, Call: +91-9513736499 (8:00 AM – 8:00 PM), or email us at wecare@allen.in
